contents: "Drake Stevens" is known as the comic character Airman.
The creator of Airman, (comics character) is George Kapitan.
John Aman, is the alternative name for the comic character, Amazing-Man.
Bill Everett is the creator of the comic character, Amazing-Man.
The character, April O'Neal, was created by Peter Laird.
The comic character, Arion, is also known by he name Ahri'ahn.
The comic character, Arion, was created by Jan Duursema.
The alternative name of Asterix (comics character) is "Astérix".
Albert Uderzo is the creator of the comic character, Asterix.
Aurakles is also known as ''Aurakles''.
Dick Dillin is the creator of Aurakles.
The creator of Auron (comics character) is Karl Kesel.
the full name of Auron (comics character) is "Lambien".
BBC was founded by John Reith 1st Baron Reith.
Rona Fairhead is the key person for BBC.
The location of the BBC is the Broadcasting House in London.
One of the products of BCC is BCC radio.
An alternative name for the comic character Balder is Balder Odinson.
Stan Lee created the comic character Balder.
The comic character, Ballistic, has the alternative name, Kelvin Mao.
The comic character Ballistic was created by Michael Manley.
John Geering is the creator of Bananaman.
Bananaman last aired on April 15th 1986.
Graeme Garden stars in Bananaman.
Baymax was created by Duncan Rouleau.
Big Hero 6 was Baymax's first film appearance.
Scott Adsit does the voice for Baymax.
Gene Colan created Ben Urich.
Hergé was the creator of the character Bianca Castafiore.
Marv Wolfman was the creator of Bibbo Bibowski.
Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures is the distributor of the film , Big Hero 6.
Alan Tudyk stars in the film, Big Hero 6.
Bill Oddie was born in Rochdale.
Sheldon Moldoff is the creator of Black Pirate.
"Mark Desmond" is also known as the comic character Blockbuster.
The comic character, Blockbuster, was created by Carmine Infantino.
An alternative name for the comic character Bolt is Larry Bolatinsky.
Bolt is created by Ernie Colon.
Bozo the Iron Man was created by George Brenner.
Dane Whitman is the alternative name for the comic character, Dane Whitman Black Knight.
Dane Whitman, alter ego Black Knight, was created by John Buscema.
Dick Dillian is from the United States.
Doug Moench won the Eagle Award (comics).
The nationality of Duncan Rouleau is American.
Ernie Colón is a national of Puerto Rico so he is considered Puerto Rican.
Gene Colan has been awarded the Eisner Award.
Gene Colan is an American.
Graeme Garden was born in Aberdeen.
Jack Kirby is an American.
Jan Duursema has won the Eisner Award.
Jerry Ordway's nationality is American.
John Buscema was awarded an award by the Academy of Comic Book Arts.
American was the nationality of John Buscema.
Len Wein collected an award from the Academy of Comic Book Arts.
Marv Wolfwan won an award at the Academy of Comic Book Arts.
Paris Cullins is a United States national.
Rene Goscinny is a French national.
The comic book writer, Roger McKenzie, is a United States national.
Roy Thomas was an award winner at the Academy of Comic Book Arts.
Sheldon Moldoff won the Inkpot Award.
Sheldon Moldoff was an American national.
The Arrow is otherwise known as Ralph Payne.
Paul Gustavson created The Arrow.
Tim Brooke-Taylor was born in Buxton.

The comic book character Auron was created by Karl Kesel, an American.
